articles.title: Aeolus satellite takes fiery plunge to Earth - BBC
articles.description: Final commands are sent to Europe's novel wind-mapping satellite Aeolus to bring it out of the sky.
articles.content:
Final commands were sent to Europe's Aeolus satellite on Friday to bring it out of the sky.
The space laser, which was designed to map Earth's winds, re-entered the atmosphere over Antarctica.
